title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush on Tuesday. Joe Biden disappearance act good for his campaign. Coronavirus is the disease of globalism. The experts still know nothing about COVID-19. Kim Jong-un is alive. The central lie of China and the WHO’s Beijing Bob. It’s either blame China or blame Trump. Being a victim doesn’t make you a hero. The real problem with the stimulus checks.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The people resent the lockdowns. American companies step up to the challenge when the state fails. Caller concerned his father will be a victim of Cuomo’s hypocrisy. Oyster farting concerns climate change scientists. A planted piece to fix up Hope Hicks. How to deal with the disease of globalism. There’s no science behind governors’ decisions. Right to a speedy trial suspended in Michigan. Trump orders meat-packing plants to stay open.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Mark Steyn interviews Georgia governor, Brian Kemp. Someone else should go to jail for what happened to Michael Flynn. Daily Caller: Media Matters founder accused of tax fraud. Reopening should have happened weeks ago. Living in the authoritarian state reality is scary. We should remember the stories of the lives lost because of this Chinese virus. What is life in Fiji like now? It’s a nanny state that can’t nanny.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
